channel.title: Missing pivot barchart
channel.description:
Hi all, I notice there're some new update on redash in recent days, the new UI/UX looks better. But I also notice that it seems pivot barchart feature was removed, i wonder why this feature is removed? I used this feature a lot and very helpful in my cases. Is that any possibility I can still use the feature or can we have this feature back (if it's removed) in the near future?
Thank you!

item.title: Missing pivot barchart
item.dc:creator: mif17
item.description:
Hi all,
I notice there’re some new update on redash in recent days, the new UI/UX looks better. But I also notice that it seems pivot barchart feature was removed, i wonder why this feature is removed?
